title: Did the police in Riot Gear screw up Violyn Vigel for Elijah McClane?
subtitle: The video footage recorded at the Ilya McLean ceremony in Aurora, Colorado, caused widespread concern in June and July 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Police wear riot equipment in Aurora, Colorado peacefully disabled "Veline Vivlyn" in the memory of Elijah McLean, in June 2020.
